detail_desc: Joggers in soft stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, ribbed bands, patch front pockets and a ribbed hem. No fasteners.
Short T-shirt dress in soft jersey with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Bag decoration with a metal keyring, large faux fur pompom and imitation leather tassel. Length 12 cm.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with cuffs and a zip at the hems.

Long, lightweight, padded parka in cotton twill with a high stand-up collar with a press-stud, and a drawstring hood. Zip and button band with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press stud and a drawstring at the waist. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a frill trim and ties at the top and a V-shaped opening. Pleats at the shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves, a seam under the bust and a flare to the hem.
Pyjama bottoms in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a gentle V-neck and spaghetti shoulder straps with crossover lacing at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist, a flounced trim at the top, and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, a seam at the hem and a ribbed, rounded peplum.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with short sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Open-toed court shoes in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester with open sides and slim, covered heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft cotton jersey.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft organic cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a yoke, dropped shoulders, a print on the sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Metal bangle. Width 0.9 cm.

Textile marker that allows you to decorate your fabric odds and ends and give them a unique and personal design. Add some style to your canvas trainers, fabric bag or T-shirt. Available in several colours. How to use: 1. Let the marker do the work and allow your creativity to flow. 2. Leave the ink to set for at least 24 hours so that it is totally fixed and wash-proof. 3. Can’t wait for 24 hours? Iron it.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Low funnel collar, dropped shoulders, long, tapered sleeves and a straight-cut hem. The polyester content of the jumper is partly recycled.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Wide top in a soft weave with a wide neckline with narrow elastication at the top and long, flared sleeves with smock details.

Blouse in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with a collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Blouse in a viscose-blend weave with a spot print, collar with long, wide ties and concealed buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long  puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Glittery yoyo with a lenticular print. Diameter 5.5 cm. Not for children under 3 years old.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton with short raglan sleeves.
Ankle-length leggings in sturdy jacquard-patterned jersey. Regular waist with concealed elastication and slim legs.
Hat in a soft, chunky rib knit with a faux fur pompom on the top and sewn-in turn-up.
Jacket in washed denim with flap chest pockets with a button, buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.
High-waisted leggings in microfibre with a wide waist panel. The leggings are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Shirt in a textured cotton weave with a cutaway collar, classic front, and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke at the back, a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a foldover shaft. The socks are made partly from organic cotton.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar and covered buttons at the top. Detachable tie belt at the waist and long, slightly wider sleeves with covered buttons at the narrow cuffs. Unlined.
Short, wide dress in a viscose weave with short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Relaxed-fit top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in lightweight, patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut at the top, a seam at the waist and a zip at the back. Unlined.
Loose-fitting shirt in cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Strapless balconette bra in microfibre with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Silicone trim and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Shoulder straps included.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with lapped shoulders, puff sleeves with a decorative scalloped trim and press-studs at the crotch.
Ankle boots with round toes and a zip in the side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 5.5 cm.
Shorts in soft, washed cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Handbag accessory in the shape of a tied scarf in a patterned weave with a metal keyring and carabiner hook. Length approx. 34 cm.
Cowl-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some wool in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Cotton flannel shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Calf-length satin dress with a deep V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Short puff sleeves with gathered elastication for a gently draped effect, an elasticated seam at the waist and a small frill trim around the neckline, waist and skirt. Lined at the top.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a turtle neck in a slightly shorter, boxy fit with a straight hem. Long raglan sleeves with block-coloured sections.
Loose-fit, cotton poplin shirt with a collar, dropped shoulders, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a round, ribbed neckline.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short skater skirt in soft velour with an elasticated waist.

Trainers in mesh with details in imitation leather, a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a decorative lacing detail around the heel. Grosgrain loops front and back. Jersey linings, mesh insoles and chunky soles.
T-shirt in big hole mesh with a ribbed neckline and raw edges at the sleeves and hem.
Set with a fleece-lined hat and pair of fleece-lined mittens in a jacquard knit. Hat with a pompom on top and ties under the chin. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top. Size 2-6M without thumbs.

Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Linings in fabric made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Chunky soles. Heel 4.5 cm. Platform 3.5 cm.
Fitted, smocked blouse in woven fabric with a frill-trimmed boat neck, long, voluminous puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs, and a frill trim at the hem.
Cold shoulder top in a soft viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated, lace-trimmed flounce at the shoulders.

LIMITED EDITION. Dress in an airy cotton weave with embroidery, a square neckline and small opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves that widen to the ends with a slit and drawstring at the cuffs. Cotton lining.

Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, a lace frill at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back. Side support and a silicone trim.
Tear-shaped metal earrings. Length 5.5 cm.
Pyjama shorts in soft patterned jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist,a fake fly and side pockets.

Ankle-length trousers in slightly stretchy twill made from a cotton blend with a high, paper bag, drawstring waist. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey in various designs with press-studs down the front that continue along one leg. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and cut-off fringing at the sleeve-ends and hem.
Sleeveless, flared top in crinkled viscose with short, narrow shoulder straps, a small opening with a button at the back of the neck and a lace-trimmed hem.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
High-waisted trousers in stretch jersey containing glittery threads with a concealed zip in one side and slim legs.
5-pocket trousers in washed, superstretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
LIMITED EDITION. Wide, ankle-length trousers in soft velour with a high waist, zip fly and extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, a low crotch and straight legs.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing with a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped key pocket at the back and reflective details.

Short, fitted dress in soft jersey with a matching, sewn-in top in sweatshirt fabric. Dress in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and stripes down the sides. Cropped top with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Sports socks in a cotton blend.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Vest top in jersey crêpe with scalloped edges.
